00233 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00234 /* Macros check I2C slave address */
00235 #define PARAM_I2C_SLAVEADDR_CH(n)       ((n>=0) && (n<=3))
00236 
00238 #define PARAM_I2Cx(n)   ((((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_I2C0)) \
00239 || (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_I2C1)) \
00240 || (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_I2C2)))
00241 
00242 /* Macros check I2C monitor configuration type */
00243 #define PARAM_I2C_MONITOR_CFG(n) ((n==I2C_MONITOR_CFG_SCL_OUTPUT) || (I2C_MONITOR_CFG_MATCHALL))
